Package client.Controllers

Class mainPage

java.lang.Object
client.Controllers.mainPage
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChatPageController, CommentPageController, MainMenuController, MainPageController, MyProfileController, NewPostPageController, ProfilePageController, SearchChatController, SearchPageController, SettingPageController, UserListPageController
public class mainPage
extends java.lang.Object
the mother of all the pages which have the radioButtons at the bottom. each method of this class load a page and nothing more.
